title: Boys Cotton T-Shirt
description: Soft and breathable cotton t-shirt for everyday wear. Designed with playful colors and durable stitching for active kids.

title: Girls Floral Dress
description: A lightweight, flowy dress with a bright floral print. Perfect for parties, outings, and casual wear during warm days.

title: Unisex Hoodie
description: Comfortable fleece hoodie that keeps kids warm and cozy. Features a front pocket and adjustable hood.

title: Denim Jeans
description: Classic kids’ denim jeans with stretch fabric for extra comfort. Durable enough for playtime and stylish for outings.

title: Striped Polo Shirt
description: Trendy polo shirt with colorful stripes. Ideal for both school and casual wear with a soft fabric finish.

title: Girls Party Skirt
description: A sparkly layered skirt that adds charm to any occasion. Lightweight, fun, and perfect for birthdays and events.

title: Kids Sweatpants
description: Comfort-fit sweatpants for kids, made with stretchable fabric. Great for school, playtime, and lounging at home.

title: Winter Jacket
description: Insulated winter jacket to keep kids warm in cold weather. Features zip closure, hood, and side pockets.

title: Boys Shorts Pack
description: Set of comfortable cotton shorts in assorted colors. Designed for all-day play with an elastic waistband.

title: Girls Leggings
description: Stretchable leggings for school or play. Made from soft fabric that’s easy to wash and comfortable to wear.

title: Kids Pajama Set
description: Cozy two-piece pajama set with fun prints. Designed for maximum comfort to help kids sleep peacefully.

title: Unisex Raincoat
description: Lightweight raincoat with waterproof material and hood. Keeps kids dry while allowing free movement.
